attributes.action: Allow the sound of azan in uk mosques to go outside  the mosque walls
attributes.additional_details:
Because  islam has been around  for long  enough 
And there are millions  of Muslims living  in  the  uk 
And the azan is apart of our religion  we have not been able to practice  properly it is the call to prayer
attributes.background: Allow this to be done by mosques  in the uk

rejection.details:
The amplification of the azan beyond the walls of a mosque is already allowed up to a specified volume level, subject to planning permission which is a matter for local authorities.

You could start a petition calling on the Government to require local authorities to presume in favour of granting planning permission for the broadcasting of the call to prayer at any time of day during Ramadan, unless the Council has specific objections, if that is what you'd like to happen.
